name: Utopia Simulator
description:
Sci-fi paradise? Religious commune? Build your utopia in this game made for Jamulator 2021, though it won't be easy.

Respond to events, set policies, and try to keep your people happy over the course of your utopia's first five years.

Note: This game requires WebGL2.0, which can have spotty support. If you have trouble running it in the browser, try a downloadable build.
